function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dissemination of coronavirus through social contact and movement.","Impact":"Spread of the virus causing illness and death, straining healthcare system, and impacting economy and society.","Mitigation":"Enforcing social distancing, promoting hygiene, and implementing travel restrictions.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening, remote work technology.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, essential workers, and the elderly.","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, employers, and individuals."},{"Description":"Failure to comply with social distancing and hygiene measures.","Impact":"Increased spread of the virus, overwhelming healthcare system, and prolonged duration of the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, penalties for non-compliance, and provision of support for vulnerable populations.","Technologies":"Public communication platforms, surveillance technology, telemedicine.","People":"General public, employers, law enforcement, and vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Government, employers, healthcare organizations, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Misinformation leading to non-compliance with preventive measures.","Impact":"Confusion, fear, and distrust, hindering implementation of effective strategies to contain the virus.","Mitigation":"Fact-checking, clear communication from authorities, and public education campaigns.","Technologies":"Social media monitoring, official communication channels, and fact-checking tools.","People":"General public, media organizations, and community leaders.","Owner":"Government, media organizations, fact-checking agencies."}]}
